vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) that which is empty, folly, silly, foolish
2) (BDB) unsavouriness, unseemliness (moral)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 寡廉鮮恥, 不適當的行為 (道德上的)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 寡廉鲜耻, 不适当的行为 (道德上的)
